long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Need to create an account for Google? Login to sites like Ticketmaster and Facebook with a phone number? Or perhaps you want a phone number for PayPal? Look no further. Textverified offers temporary phone number verifications for a myriad of services, including the most popular platforms like Google, Craigslist, Facebook, Ticketmaster, PayPal, Tinder, Uber, DoorDash, or Match.com. We provide users with real US mobile numbers backed by physical SIMs â€“ compatible with all platforms. Whether you're signing up for a new account, verifying your identity, or accessing exclusive offers, our service ensures seamless verification without compromising your privacy. 

A companion plugin for textverified.com, an SMS verification service. Designed to improve your online verification experience alongside our website, Textverified (textverified.com), our free extension integrates the verification functionalities available on our platform and brings you additional features to enhance user workflow and streamline verifications. 

SIMPLIFY TEMPORARY PHONE NUMBER VERIFICATIONS:
Our extension eliminates guesswork by suggesting commonly verified services based on the website, removing the need for manual searching or favoriting. Experience enhanced multitasking capabilities with our cross-tab verifications feature, where verifications initiated through the extension are linked to the tab they started on, enabling users to manage multiple verifications effortlessly. Our autofill feature simplifies verification by automatically filling phone numbers and codes on sites like Bumble and Amazon with a click of a button.

SECURE YOUR ONLINE PRESENCE:
We prioritize safeguarding your personal information in an era marked by escalating cyber threats and data breaches. By offering temporary phone numbers for online verification, we empower you to shield your identity from potential risks associated with using traditional personal identifiers.

Download our free Textverified extension today and access temporary phone number verifications seamlessly. Visit our website, textverified.com, for additional features like voice verifications and long term phone number rentals.
